usefulItems: paper muffin cases, airtight container, wire rack, 12 hole muffin tin, skewer, oven
title: Marmite and Cheese Muffins

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and line a 12 hole muffin tin with paper muffin cases.
Place Cheddar in mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place 100 g butter and 50 g Marmite in mixing bowl then melt <b>2 min 30 sec/60°C/speed 1<b>.
Add flour, 200 g reserved grated Cheddar, milk, eggs and baking powder then mix <b>1 min//speed 3<b>. Pour into prepared muffin cases.
Bake for 15-18 minutes (180°C) until golden brown and a skewer inserted in centre comes out clean. Meanwhile, clean mixing bowl and make topping.
Place remaining 20 g Marmite, remaining 50 g butter and remaining reserved grated Cheddar in mixing bowl then heat <b>5 min/80°C/speed 1<b>.
Leave muffins to cool in tin for 5 minutes then transfer to a wire rack. Spoon topping over muffins and serve warm or leave to cool completely before storing in an airtight container.
